description:
Tamoggemon Editor - your pure text editor as stand-alone application.


Ever felt like writing a longer note on the go? Wanted to edit a text or source file you copied onto the device? Artist or writer?

Whatever - this app has you covered. Create plain-text files on the go, store them local onto your device and edit them later.

Our app includes the following features:

 • Create text files
 • Read and edit text files
 • Delete text files
 • Save files onto your device
 • UTF-8 formatting 
 • Export files as PDF
 • Search / replace text
 • Send text as Email / SMS / facebook
 • Manage the file extension
 • Can be registered as default app
 • Professional preferences
 • Full multitasking support 
   (every file can be edited in a separate card)
 
If you run into problems, have questions or ideas to improve the app, please contact us. We're available seven days a week and always happy to support you. If you have download problems, please contact Palm. 

Editor is a quality app powered by Tamoggemon. Download it today, it's worth...

PRICE REDUCTION
versionNote: Send via Email BUG fixed (new lines)
